entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
